// Java比较运算
package xiangmu;
public class Ceshi {
    public static void main(String args[]) {
        int a = 5;
        if(a == 5) {
            dayin(a + "等于5");
        }
        if(a != 3) {
            dayin(a + "不等于3");
        }
        if(a > 1) {
            dayin(a + "大于1");
        }
        if(a >= 5) {
            dayin(a + "大于等于5");
        }
        if(a < 6) {
            dayin(a + "小于6");
        }
        if(a <= 5) {
            dayin(a + "小于等于5");
        }
    }
    public static void dayin(String zifuchuan) {
        System.out.println(zifuchuan);
    }
} 
5等于5
5不等于3
5大于1
5大于等于5
5小于6
5小于等于5
